name: logdy
description: Logdy Core is a platform for collecting and analyzing logs in real-time from distributed systems. It features streaming dashboards, filterable views, and storage that works in both cloud and self-hosted environments.
features: Real-Time Logs: Streaming dashboards, Live updates, Instant visibility. Monitor logs as they happen.
Filtering & Search: Advanced filters, Full-text search, Query builder. Find relevant logs quickly.
Distributed Systems: Multi-source collection, Centralized view, Scalable architecture. Handle logs from anywhere.
Flexible Deployment: Cloud or self-hosted, Docker support, Easy setup. Deploy where you need it.
